Name: Mahasona
About the game: Mahasona is a Third-person, Multiplayer, Social Horror game. Developed by RAM studios and Publish by Appscurve Studios . Where you can team up with other players as a team of four kids to find a treasure that belongs to a Demon name Mahasona. You as a kid need to find artifacts to unlock the treasure. As Mahasona you have to stop the kids from finding the Treasure before sunrise. The Sun Rising Finds the Treasure. Mahasona is hunting you!!! How to play This game uses Steam servers to make matches. So you and your 4 friends can host a match or you can find a match using the Server browser in-game. once you load into the match you have to select a Character. Once all 5 players choose a character and ready up the match will begin. Mahasona the demon will be randomly given to a player. The player who gets to play as Mahasona has to find 4 kids before they find your Treasure. Kids have to find artifacts to find the location of the Treasure. Each kid has a unique skill and a passive ability. Mahasona has Demon Vision which highlight kids withing a small radius This is how the game works. Day Night Each match will start at 12:00 AM ingame time and ends at 6:00 AM ingame time. You can see the time on your HUD. the game also has a day-night cycle so you'll see the sunrise.
